title: Ticket #2664: remove supplemental group tracking
description: Once cgroups is tried and true, we should consider getting rid of support for supplemental group tracking. We are accumulating quite a lot of obscure code paths to maintain, as evidenced by the recent incident in #2658.
remarks:
2011-Nov-28 11:03:05 by bbockelm:
Unfortunately, RHEL5 has a long set of legs on it, which would probably nix this idea until about 2014.

I would be fine with this if we added proc_connector tracking to the procd for RHEL5-based platforms. See http://osgtech.blogspot.com/2011/06/part-ii-keeping-mindful-eye-on-your.html
creator: danb
